In England, in the seven days to 16 December, there were 454,133 new confirmed cases (803.1 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 09 December, there were 294,492 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 54% (159,641 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 21 December is 9,810,446 (17,348.2 cases per 100,000 population).
